review: They haven't provided HDMI cable with this product and I need to order it for that again. If they could have provided HDMI cable along with device is helpful.Regarding the Fire TV , Its Good with all pre loaded apps and also I installed additional apps like YuppTV,Sling TV and screen mirror from my fire phone to fire tv is too good. and Not noticed any crash of the applications delivered and Voice search also working and Good its recognized my voice(I am from India with different accent) :)
